Test Name: Chikungunya Virus, PCR (Molecular Detection), Spinal Fluid
Purpose: To detect Chikungunya virus (CHIKV) RNA in cerebrospinal fluid using polymerase chain reaction (PCR).
Container: Sterile, anticoagulant-free tube (e.g., 1.5 mL microcentrifuge or screw-cap tube)
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes
